      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(Link i,
                       Link j,
                       DriverType driver)
        Description copied from class: IntersectionControl
        An abstract function to determine if a Vehicle can move. DriverType is required because certain policies may allow only certain type of vehicles to move.
        Specified by:
        canMove in class IntersectionControl
        Parameters:
        i - An incoming Link to the intersection.
        j - An outgoing Link from the intersection.
        driver - For knowing the DriverType.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the vehicle can move from link i to link j.

      • hasConflictRegions

        public boolean hasConflictRegions()
        Description copied from class: IntersectionControl
        An abstract function to determine if there is a conflict region (for TBR based policy; TBR stands for Tile Based Reservation).
        Specified by:
        hasConflictRegions in class IntersectionControl
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating if this intersection control has conflict regions.

        public int getType()
        Description copied from class: IntersectionControl
        Returns the type code for this IntersectionControl
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • getSignal

        public Signalized getSignal()
        Description copied from class: IntersectionControl
        Returns a Signalized for this intersection, if one exists, to add signal data
        Specified by:
        getSignal in class IntersectionControl
        Returns:
        a Signalized which signal timing data may be added to, if one exists. Returns null if this intersection is not a signal.
        See Also:
        Signalized
